items.title: Venezuelan Nobel Peace Prize winner presents her medal to Trump
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉诺贝尔和平奖得主向特朗普颁奖
items.summary: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado has told reporters that she presented the medal for her Nobel Peace Prize to President Donald Trump at a private White House meeting on Thursday, but did not say if he accepted it.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉反对派领袖玛丽亚·科琳娜·马查多告诉记者,她在星期四举行的白宫非公开会议上向总统唐纳德·特朗普颁发了诺贝尔和平奖奖章,但没有说是否接受.

items.title: Iran authorities demanding large sums for return of protesters' bodies, BBC told
items.title_zh: 伊朗当局要求归还抗议者尸体,
items.summary: Families of people killed in the protests in Iran have told the BBC that the authorities are demanding large sums of money to return their bodies for burial.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗抗议中遇难者的家属告诉英国广播公司,当局要求归还他们的尸体以安葬。

items.title: US forces seize a sixth Venezuela-linked oil tanker in Caribbean Sea
items.title_zh: 美军在加勒比海夺取了第六艘委内瑞拉联通的油轮
items.summary: The US has seized a sixth tanker in the Caribbean Sea in its ongoing efforts to control exports of Venezuelan oil, officials say.
items.summary_zh: 美国在加勒比海扣押了第六艘油轮,

items.title: 東京 杉並 2人殺傷の容疑者 “自分も死んでもかまわない”供述
items.title_zh: 东京杉奈 两个嫌疑人“我不能死”。
items.summary: 東京 杉並区 2人殺傷 逮捕の容疑者 “自暴自棄になった”供述
items.summary_zh: 东京的Suginami-ku 2人杀害逮捕嫌疑“我变得自私”

items.title: European military personnel arrive in Greenland as Trump says US needs island
items.title_zh: 欧洲军人抵达格陵兰 川普说美国需要岛屿
items.summary: A small French military contingent has arrived in Greenland's capital Nuuk, officials say, as several European states deploy small numbers in a so-called reconnaissance mission.
items.summary_zh: 官员们说,随着几个欧洲国家部署少量人员执行所谓的侦察任务,一支小规模的法国军事特遣队已抵达格陵兰首都努克.

items.title: 立民 公明 衆院選に向け新党結成で合意 きょうにも党名発表
items.title_zh: 公民同意组成新政党参加公共选举
items.summary: 立民 公明 衆院選に向け新党結成で合意
items.summary_zh: 缔结新政党,进行公开选举

items.title: Iran judiciary denies plan to execute detained protester Erfan Soltani
items.title_zh: 伊朗司法机构否认处决被拘留抗议者Erfan Soltani的计划。
items.summary: Iran's judiciary has denied it scheduled the execution of a man arrested in connection with the country's recent protests.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗司法部门否认计划处决因该国最近抗议而被捕的男子。

items.title: Ethiopia says seized ammunition sent by Eritrea to rebels as tensions rise
items.title_zh: 埃塞俄比亚说,随着紧张局势的加剧,厄立特里亚缴获了给叛军的弹药。
items.summary: Ethiopian police say they have seized thousands of rounds of ammunition sent by Eritrea to a violent armed rebel group, stoking fears of renewed armed conflict.
items.summary_zh: 埃塞俄比亚警察说,他们缴获了厄立特里亚送交一个暴力武装叛乱团体的数千发弹药,令人担心武装冲突会再起。

items.title: Votes being counted in Uganda election as opposition alleges rigging
items.title_zh: 在乌干达选举中,
items.summary: Votes are being counted in parts of Uganda amid an internet shutdown and opposition accusations of rigging in presidential and parliamentary elections.
items.summary_zh: 在乌干达部分地区,

items.title: Large fire breaks out in Dutch city of Utrecht following explosion
items.title_zh: 荷兰城市乌得勒支发生大火
items.summary: A large fire has broken out following an explosion at a building in the Dutch city of Utrecht.
items.summary_zh: 荷兰城市乌得勒支的一栋建筑发生爆炸后,大火已起.

items.title: Federal agent shoots man in leg after Minneapolis shovel attack, officials say
items.title_zh: 联邦特工在明尼阿波利斯铲子袭击后射伤了人的腿 官员说
items.summary: A federal officer has shot a man in the leg in the US city of Minneapolis after being attacked with a shovel as he tried to make an arrest, the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) says.
items.summary_zh: 一名联邦官员在美国明尼阿波利斯市用铲子袭击了一名男子,

items.title: Boeing knew of flaw in part linked to UPS plane crash, US safety board report says
items.title_zh: 波音知道部分与UPS空难有关的缺陷 美国安全局的报告称
items.summary: An aircraft that crashed in flames in Kentucky in November had a structural flaw that had been identified by Boeing on similar planes 15 years ago, according to investigators.
items.summary_zh: 一架于11月在肯塔基州失火中坠毁的飞机有一个结构缺陷,据调查人员称,15年前在类似飞机上被波音识别出.

items.title: She's offered to share her Nobel with Trump. But what might Machado ask for in return?
items.title_zh: 她被提议与特朗普分享诺贝尔. 但马查多会要求什么回报?
items.summary: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado may hold the Nobel Peace Prize, but she knows there is only one foreign endorsement that really matters: Donald Trump's.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉反对派领袖玛丽亚·科里娜·马查多(María Corina Machado)可能举办诺贝尔和平奖,但她知道只有一个外国认可才是真正重要的:唐纳德·特朗普的.

items.title: Pitfalls loom as Trump's Gaza peace plan enters second phase
items.title_zh: 随着特朗普的"加沙和平计划"进入第二阶段,陷阱即将来临
items.summary: On the face of it, the announcement of phase two of President Donald Trump's peace plan for Gaza would seem like progress.
items.summary_zh: 表面上看,宣布唐纳德·特朗普总统的加沙和平计划第二阶段似乎有进步.

items.title: Astronauts splash down to Earth after medical evacuation from space station
items.title_zh: 宇航员从空间站医疗后送后向地上飞去
items.summary: Four astronauts evacuated from the International Space Station (ISS) have landed back on Earth after their stay in space was cut short by a month due to a "serious" medical issue.
items.summary_zh: 国际空间站(ISS)撤离的4名宇航员由于"严重"医疗问题被缩短了在太空停留一个月后已返回地球.

items.title: Zelensky declares energy emergency as biting cold persists
items.title_zh: Zelensky宣布能源紧急,
items.summary: Ukraine has declared a state of emergency in the country's energy sector, with a particular focus on Kyiv, as ongoing Russian strikes continue to leave thousands of residents without power.
items.summary_zh: 乌克兰已宣布该国能源部门进入紧急状态,重点特别放在基辅,因为持续进行的俄罗斯罢工继续使数千名居民失去电力。

items.title: Watch: Astronauts return to Earth after medical evacuation
items.title_zh: 观察:宇航员在医疗后送后返回地球
items.summary: Four astronauts who left the International Space Station (ISS) a month early due to one of the crew members falling ill have returned to Earth on Thursday.
items.summary_zh: 由于一名乘员生病而提前一个月离开国际空间站(ISS)的4名宇航员已经于星期四返回地球.

items.title: Watch: Aerial footage shows cars swept away by flash floods in Australia
items.title_zh: 观察:空中镜头显示澳大利亚被山洪冲走的汽车
items.summary: Australia's Great Ocean Road, famous for its scenic coastal views, was forced to close on Thursday after flash floods triggered by a storm hit the state of Victoria.
items.summary_zh: 澳大利亚的"大海洋道"以风景优美的海岸风景而出名,在一场风暴袭击维多利亚州后爆发了山洪后于星期四被迫关闭.

items.title: Singapore's opposition leader stripped of title after conviction for lying
items.title_zh: 新加坡反对派领袖因撒谎被判有罪后,
items.summary: Singapore's Leader of the Opposition in parliament, Pritam Singh, has been stripped of his title by the prime minister following a vote by lawmakers.
items.summary_zh: 新加坡议会反对党领袖普里塔姆·辛格在立法者投票后被总理剥夺头衔.

items.title: 'It was terrifying': Residents describe carnage after Thai train crash kills 32
items.title_zh: "这是可怕的": 泰国火车相撞造成32人死亡,
items.summary: Residents in Thailand's Ban Thanon Khot are accustomed to the rumbling of trains – rail is a key mode of transportation connecting the remote town with major cities.
items.summary_zh: 泰国Ban Thanon Khot的居民习惯于火车倒塌,

items.title: Rift at top of the Taliban: BBC reveals clash of wills behind internet shutdown
items.title_zh: 塔利班高层的裂痕:BBC披露网络关闭背后的意志冲突.
items.summary: It was a piece of audio obtained by the BBC that revealed what worries the Taliban's leader most.
items.summary_zh: 这是BBC获得的一段录音,

items.title: Why the UAE has incurred the wrath of Somalia
items.title_zh: 阿联酋为何遭受索马里的愤怒
items.summary: For weeks, Somalia has been engaged in intense diplomatic efforts to rally international support after Israel recognised its breakaway region of Somaliland as an independent state.
items.summary_zh: 数周来,在以色列承认其分离的索马里兰地区为独立国家后,索马里一直在大力进行外交努力,以争取国际支持。

items.title: From behind bars, Aung San Suu Kyi casts a long shadow over Myanmar
items.title_zh: 昂山素季在监狱里对缅甸投下长长的阴影
items.summary: As of Wednesday the Burmese democracy campaigner Aung San Suu Kyi will have spent a total of 20 years in detention in Myanmar, five of them since her government was overthrown by a military coup in February 2021.
items.summary_zh: 缅甸民主运动者昂山素季将在缅甸被关押了总共20年,

items.title: 'I carried my wife's body for an hour and a half' - BBC hears stories of protesters killed in Iran
items.title_zh: 我带着我太太的尸体一个半小时,
items.summary: Warning: This article contains graphic descriptions of death and injury
items.summary_zh: 警告: 这篇文章载有死亡和伤害的图形描述。

items.title: Watch: Paraglider survives 500ft drop into ocean
items.title_zh: 观察: 滑翔机在500英尺远的海域生存
items.summary: Dramatic video shows a paraglider fall nearly 500ft (152m) into the into ocean at Riviera Beach in Palm Beach County, Florida on 9 January.
items.summary_zh: 1月9日在佛罗里达州棕榈滩县的里维埃拉海滩,

items.title: 'Grim scene': BBC on site after crane collapses on train in Thailand
items.title_zh: '格里姆场景':BBC在泰国火车起重机倒塌后现场
items.summary: A construction crane fell onto a moving train in north-eastern Thailand, killing at least 32 people and injuring 66 others.
items.summary_zh: 一辆建筑起重机倒入泰国东北部的一列动车,造成至少32人死亡,66人受伤.

items.title: Trump vows 'very strong action' if Iran executes protesters
items.title_zh: 如果伊朗处决抗议者,
items.summary: US President Donald Trump says he'll take "very strong action" if Iran executes protesters.
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普表示,如果伊朗处决抗议者,他将采取"非常有力的行动".
